game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where time is broken, players take on the role of a temporal guardian tasked with mending the fabric of reality. As they journey through ancient ruins and mystical realms, they uncover the secrets behind the catastrophic event known as 'The Great Dissonance' that shattered the timeline.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of Erebo, where players are introduced to their mentor, a wise old sage who has been searching for them. He reveals that the player is the chosen one, destined to repair the timestream and prevent the coming apocalypse.
game.ending: After traversing multiple timelines and eras, players finally reach the heart of the anomaly: a realm where time has no meaning. There, they face their nemesis, the Time Reaver, in an epic battle that will decide the fate of existence. Depending on the player's choices throughout the game, the ending may vary from a triumphant restoration of the timeline to a catastrophic collapse into nothingness.
